ygData.subject: Re: My Yk!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, I saw this also.  Just one thing to say ... that guide (Camii) is not the best guide in the world. I recently was invovled in a fairly minor bug where I
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, I saw this also. Just one thing to say ... that guide (Camii)
is not the best guide in the world.

I recently was invovled in a fairly minor bug where I died right before the
zone crashed. After it came back online, I discovered that I had a full
set of equipment still on me (like I hadn't died at all) and a corpse
of me with another set of all my equipment.

How little effort it would have taken to loot that stuff
rest. I had easily 10-15k of goodies on me I could have sold.
Instead, I reported it as a bug, and Camii came and was VERY abrupt
about the situation, after telling me to /consent him, he looted
the corpse and disappeared without the usual "Have a nice day"
tell you get at the end... I received a lot of flak from my group
members because they could have used those items, and them stupid
guide doesn't even thank me.

Of course, this was Camii on the E'ci server, I would assume
that would be the same person?

Razzan


>
> Hey Rokenn, I saw your reply on www.everquest.com to that level 44 wizard
> that got his and 2 of his brothers accounts banned for stealing loot from
> someones corpse while consented. Anyone else see this and if so what did
> you make of this situation, sounds a bit dodgy to me??
>
> Madagan
>
>
>
>
> "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...> on 05/01/2000 19:03:02
>
> Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com
>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] My Yk!!!
>
>
>
>
> You forgot one in the 40-50 catagory:
> Orb of Tashania
> 7 dam
> 25 delay
> 1h blunt
> +9 Str
> +9 Sta
> +35 Mana
> Effect: Tashania (44th lvl enchanter MR debuff, lower MR by 60ish)
> usable by: BRD NEC WIZ ENC MAG
> Dropped by Lord Naga-pus.
>
> Best thing about this is that in smart dragon raiding parties this is a
> Bard
> only lotto :)
>
> Does great with a Ykesha, as once the orb procs the Ykesha is rarely
> resisted.
>
> Rokenn
>
> >From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
> >Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
> >To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
> >Subject: RE: [eqbards] My Yk!!!
> >Date: Wed, 5 Jan 2000 12:42:50 -0600
> >
> >imho - really depends on your level -
> >
> >1-8
> >giant snake fang - great newbie wep
> >short sword - buy one asap
> >
> >9-20
> >combine long sword / combine scim - time to wup up on magic mobs
> >dragoon dirk (used mine until level 40)
> >
> >20-30
> >ashenwood short spear
> >polish garnet tommy chopper
> >thuilan claws
> >
> >30-40
> >staff o' wriggling
> >obscene shard
> >crystalline blade
> >silvery axe
> >
> >40-50
> >Yk's
> >Electum Bladed Wazukazi
> >Planes weps
> >
> >That kinda matches the "get-ability" of the weapons and the xp levels.
> >
> >Sylly
> >
> >
> >
